Our story

We build calm, open-source digital homes.

3dvr.tech started as a community experiment: help friends ship meaningful websites fast, keep the tech open, and offer support that feels human. Today we help founders and builders grow with confidence — without the noise.

Start your build See plans

Mission

Make the web feel approachable for makers by pairing clear design with ongoing support.

Values

  • Open-source mindset
  • Calm, sustainable workflows
  • Community-first growth

Short story

We noticed a gap: builders could find tools or agencies, but not a steady partner who blended strategy, automation, and care. 3dvr.tech became that partner — an accessible subscription that keeps websites alive long after launch.

Our promise

We move fast without rushing. We keep your voice intact. And we make sure every feature is tied to a real outcome: more clarity, more trust, and more conversions.
